name: Balfron Tower - reconstructed (2017)
description: a 3D reconstruction of the Balfron Tower by Ern≈ë Goldfinger(pre-gentrification Era);  The building is an icon of Brutalist architecture and innovative community-oriented designs for social housing; situated in East London near the Financial District of the city where a high diversity of ethnicities meets; This reconstruction of the architecture dates back before its redevelopment plans and marks the transition from social housing to luxury flats. The building was abandoned at the time of the reconstruction process.  This exclusive 3D asset has been created by Matteo Zamagni as part of the production of his Short Film 'Horror Vacui' (2018).
